DOC.brief_summary: When a polyp is found, it woulf be recorded by a white-light and OE1 model with magnification for assessing and predicting its histology. After that, its really histology will be reported by an pathologist.
DOC.brief_title: Evalution of Optical Enhancement With Magnification for Polyop Histology
DOC.criteria: Patients will be included if they are found polyps during endoscopy procesure. Inflammatory bowel disease Biopsies were not available. Unable to provide informed consent.
